summary:
HOME | THE PREMISE | DESIGNATIONS | APP FORM | CLAIMS | SKELETONS

                                                           ...
caption:
HOME | THE PREMISE | DESIGNATIONS | APP FORM | CLAIMS | SKELETONS

                                        Order born from the wrath of chaos

Chicago Illinois, a city rebuilt and protected by PRIME. It is an organization tasked with policing both the Conduit species itself and maintaining the peace between it and mankind. Having bought out the privatized contract for law enforcement throughout all of Chicago; they have kept the peace within the city. Well, for the most part. The Mavericks, a group that has seen PRIME’s methods and control have begun to rebel against the organization. They Are willing to do anything to maintain their freedom and remove PRIME from the city. They are not alone, however, and when motivations within the city collide; everyone has to pick a side, even if its the wrong one.

                                                                                          CHAOS WILL ALWAYS TRIUMPH OVER ORDER

SEQUENCE is a mutant/abilities roleplay. This group contains mature themes and is rated as such. We accept OCs and Skeleton Canon characters. We concern ourselves with our members enjoying themselves having a great place to plot, post and have fun with each other. If this sounds right up your alley, feel free to check us out and ask any questions you might have.

     Accepting within twenty four hours of receiving application!

summary: Congressman Dan Crewnshaw Shows off Captain America-themed Glass Eye to Chris Evans
title: Congressman Dan Crewnshaw Shows off Captain America-themed Glass Eye to Chris Evans
body:
Congressman Dan Crewnshaw Shows off Captain America-themed Glass Eye to Chris Evans

Congressman and former Navy SEAL Dan Crenshaw showed off his Captain America-themed eye to Marvel Cinematic Universe actor Chris Evans.

Crewnshaw documented Evans’ visit on Twitter writing, “When Captain America sees your Captain America glass eye. #merica.”

When Captain America sees your Captain America glass eye. #merica pic.twitter.com/0xHb9GjSmV

— Rep. Dan Crenshaw (@RepDanCrenshaw) March 8,…

View On WordPress

blog.name: odetolove06
blog.title: Ode to love
blog.description: Female. Writer, artist. Stucky art, Marvel stuff and more. Stucky love all the way. ❤ Drawing and writing is my life. I post pictures, create GIFs and draw. Maybe occasionally write posts. Sebastian Stan, Chris Evans and Colin O'Donoghue are love. ❤ Marvel girl. Favorite TV shows: Supernatural, Sherlock (BBC), Stranger Things. Movies and music are everything. Hopefully, you might like something on my blog so you're welcome to stick around. :) Spreading love and making people happy is what I do. Feel free to drop a message anytime or ask questions.
